_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Among Us - Impostor Server
author: info@goover.de
description:
Impostor is one of the first Among Us private servers, written in C#.

The latest version supported is 2020.9.22, both desktop and mobile.

There are no special features at this moment, the goal is aiming to be as close as possible to the real server, for now. In a later stage, making modifications to game logic by modifying GameData packets can be looked at.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt -y update
apt -y upgrade
apt -y --no-install-recommends install wget curl jq unzip tar redis-server file ca-certificates apt-utils

export HOME=/mnt/server
cd $HOME

## Download latest Version or Tag
if [ -z "${GITHUB_USER}" ] && [ -z "${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN}" ] ; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    echo -e "user and oauth token set"
    alias curl='curl -u ${GITHUB_USER}:${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN} '
fi

## get release info and download links

LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -L -s -H 'Accept: application/json' https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/latest)
LATEST_VERSION=$(echo $LATEST_RELEASE | sed -e 's/.*"tag_name":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/')
DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/download/$LATEST_VERSION/$MATCH"

echo $DOWNLOAD_LINK
wget $DOWNLOAD_LINK

unzip -o Impostor-Server-linux-x64.zip
rm -fR Impostor-Server-linux-x64.zip 
chmod +x Impostor.Server
